original_text: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
korean_text: 비록 그들이 왕을 해하려 하여 음모를 꾸몄으나 이루지 못하도다

sentences.original_text: For they intended evil against thee:
which they are not able to perform.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들이 실행할 수 없는 것이었습니다.
